name: LD42 Inflation Station
description:
My entry for LD42. 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/inflation-station

 Almost a DNF, but I think perhaps I just scraped in with the bare minimum of gameplay!

There's been a glitch at the Trans-Dimensional Shipping facility.  Packages are inflating!  Get them on the shelves before they no longer fit.

BONUS: See if you can spot the "restart game" (ESC key) bug after doing an F1 ragequit.

2018-08-20: Added v1.2 build.  Fixed gravity bug on level restart.  Fixed physics issue with collision detection and boxes continuing to expand slightly when shelved.
